content: And Nevada’s Secretary of State said she supports voter ID laws because she has never had a problem showing an ID to vote. this is such a stupid mentality, like the weakest justification for racist policies ever. the circular logic of these white supremacists is such a national embarrassment: people whine and moan about something, 45 says he’s heard a lot of people talk about this something, and republicans go ahead passing un-American laws, citing the president, who was citing them in the first place. sad!
